# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.

# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

add_subdirectory(codegen)

add_library(providers-yt-codec)


target_compile_options(providers-yt-codec PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)

target_link_libraries(providers-yt-codec PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-streams-brotli
  library-cpp-yson
  cpp-yson-node
  cpp-mapreduce-interface
  cpp-mapreduce-io
  libs-apache-arrow
  yql-essentials-core
  yql-essentials-minikql
  essentials-minikql-computation
  essentials-public-udf
  yql-essentials-utils
  parser-pg_wrapper-interface
  essentials-public-result_format
  public-udf-arrow
  providers-common-codec
  common-codec-arrow
  common-schema-mkql
  common-schema-parser
  providers-yt-common
  yt-lib-mkql_helpers
  yt-lib-skiff
  yt-library-decimal
  common-codec-yt_arrow_converter_interface
)

target_sources(providers-yt-codec PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/yt_arrow_converter.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/yt_arrow_output_converter.cpp

  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/yt_codec_job.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/yt_codec.cpp

)
